carpet.rule.softObsidian.name: Soft Obsidian
carpet.rule.softObsidian.desc: Set the hardness of obsidian to be the same as end stone
carpet.rule.unPushableArmorStands.name: Unpushable Armor Stands
carpet.rule.unPushableArmorStands.desc: Armor stands won't be pushed by attacks, explosions or flowing fluids
carpet.rule.safeTeleport.name: Safe Teleport
carpet.rule.safeTeleport.desc: Prevents teleportation to unsafe locations (void, suffocation)
carpet.rule.safeTeleport.suffocation: Target location would cause suffocation, teleport blocked!
carpet.rule.tickCommandForAll.name: Tick Command For All
carpet.rule.tickCommandForAll.desc: Allows non-op players to use the /tick command
carpet.rule.beesDimCurfew.name: No Bees Work In Nether And End
carpet.rule.beesDimCurfew.desc: Prevents bees from working in the Nether and End and makes them return to their nest immediately, similar to a bug that could occur before version 1.21.2
carpet.rule.noFurnaceAsh.name: No Furnace Ash
carpet.rule.noFurnaceAsh.desc: Items without recipes pass through furnaces instantly, preventing ash waste
carpet.rule.noPlayerPortals.name: No Player Portals
carpet.rule.strongerBundle.name: Stronger Bundle
carpet.rule.strongerBundle.desc: Allows shulker boxes to be inserted into bundles (max 8), prevents bundles in shulker boxes
carpet.rule.toughArmorStands.name: Tough Armor Stands
carpet.rule.toughArmorStands.desc: Armor stands won't take damage from attacks
carpet.rule.toughSlimeBlocks.name: Tough Slime Blocks
carpet.rule.toughSlimeBlocks.desc: Set the hardness of slime blocks and honey blocks to be the same as end stone
carpet.rule.resonantWater.name: Resonant Water
carpet.rule.resonantWater.desc: Water buckets won't be consumed when surrounded by water buckets in the hotbar
